gameDetails.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island â€“ Trait Cards I
gameDetails.description:
Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island - Trait Cards I is a promotional expansion of five "trait" cards that were first released at Spiel 2012. Players choose a trait at the start of the game if they like to; each one gives a disadvantage, but also an advantage. These cards are:


     Gimp
     Pessimist
     Drunk
     The Bull
     Kid
